00052 class FMBiGainMgr2
00053 {
00054   typedef GNode Vertex;
00055   typedef GBPQueue<Vertex> VertexPQ;
00056   typedef GBPQueueCursor<Vertex> VertexPQCur;
00057 
00058 public:
00060   FMBiGainMgr2(const FMParam& param);
00061 
00063   void init(const std::vector<unsigned char>& part, const std::vector<short>& gain);
00064 
00069   Vertex* select(FMMoveInfo& moveInfo,
00070                  const std::vector<unsigned char>& , 
00071                  const BiConstrMgr3& constraintMgr)
00072   {
00073     return select(moveInfo, constraintMgr);
00074   }
00075 
00078   Vertex* select(FMMoveInfo& moveInfo,
00079                  const BiConstrMgr3& constraintMgr);
00080 
00082   int getGain(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo) const
00083   {
00084     const Vertex& v = _vertexArray[moveInfo._i_v];
00085     return _gainBucket[moveInfo._fromPart].getKey(v);
00086   }
00087 
00089   void updateMove(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo)
00090   {
00091     _gainBucket[moveInfo._fromPart].detach(_vertexArray[moveInfo._i_v]);
00092   }
00093 
00095   void updateNeighbor(unsigned int whichPart, 
00096                       unsigned int i_w, short deltaGain)
00097   {
00098     // Only free vertices are allowed to moved, therefore, only their
00099     // gains are updated.
00100     if (_cellList[i_w].isLocked()) return;
00101     _gainBucket[whichPart].modifyKeyLIFOBy(_vertexArray[i_w], deltaGain);   
00102   }
00103 
00105   void pushBack(unsigned int whichPart, const Cell& v, short gain)
00106   {
00107     _gainBucket[whichPart].pushBack(_vertexArray[&v - _cellList], gain);
00108   }
00109 
00111   void updateGain(const std::vector<unsigned char>& part,
00112                   const std::vector<short>& gain)
00113   {
00114     init(part, gain);
00115   }
00116 
00117 protected:
00118   Netlist&       _H;                  
00119   VertexPQ       _gainBucket[2];      
00120   VertexPQCur    _gainBucketCur[2];   
00121   Vertex* const  _vertexArray;        
00122   Cell* const    _cellList;           
00123 };
